body:
Live **NYC Mayoral Election odds**. Who is going to take over from Bill de Blasio to run the greatest city in the world? Andrew Yang? Maybe. He's the strong favorite but who else is in the betting market? We share the most accurate predictive resource, Betfair's betting odds, to stay on top of the NYC Mayoral Election. - - - ## **2021 NYC Mayoral Election Odds** - - -
### As an American, you can bet on the US Election. It's called PredictIt. # **[Join PredictIt Now](https://www.predictit.org/index1?utm_code=BET20)**
- - - ## **More US Political Markets** We're determined to give you the most accurate prediction data in the world. Simply by reflecting betting data. Make sure you check out: * **[2024 Presidential Election Odds](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/election-betting-odds)** * **[Democratic Candidates](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/democratic-candidate)** * **[Republican Candidates](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/republican-candidate)** - - - ## **And Who Is Bet Refinery?** We’re a team of pro sports bettors who have been collectively making our income off gambling for 20 years. We know how to identify the smart money and we create our own betting models. Which we’ll be sharing with you for FREE. Whilst we won’t be creating data model predictions from the 2024 Election, we’ll have all your favorites sports. We’re winning sports bettors and our tips are free. Join our mailing list for exclusive access as soon as our NFL, NBA, tennis, golf and other models are released. - - - ### **Sign up for the Wednesday email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ###
